title: Scenario-Based Workshops for Strengthening Organizational Learning and Knowledge Management Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of organizational operations and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Learners are active in various public/nonprofit organizations, aiming to enhance knowledge-sharing and organizational change management competencies. Requires interaction via real-time collaboration tools (Padlet, Mentimeter, etc.).

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core elements (people, processes, technology) to consider when designing organizational knowledge management systems
Learners can propose and evaluate knowledge-sharing strategies suitable for given scenarios (startups, manufacturers, consulting firms, etc.)
Learners can analyze organizational learning environment diagnostic results with 80% accuracy using checklists
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
